1344730.name: Evolution adventure
1344730.description:
Breeder Simulator: A Game Where Monsters Go on Adventures Themselves

In this game, the player takes control of a base dedicated to raising and crossbreeding monsters. Roads stretch out in all directions from the base, filled with adventures, treasures, and other monsters.

Ran out of monsters? No problem! Skip a day, and new ones will be born in your basement.

Upgrade your base, explore the map, and create the rarest and most valuable monsters.

Planned for release:

  • A global map packed with quests.

  • Over 30 base monsters for evolution.

  • More than 400 types of evolved monsters.

  • Over 20 hours of gameplay to complete the main story, with endless possibilities for discovering new evolution combinations.

Embark on this evolution adventure and become the ultimate monster breeder!
1344730.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
